body_text:
I checked with flod, and because users only get to this page by typing it into the address bar, and because we won't be running studies outside of English locales for a while anyway, he's okay shipping this without anything hiding the page for non-en-* locales. I didn't get an "official" signoff though.
The plan is to ship l10n support ASAP after we ship the initial version.
